# ChaiChatHub.com

> A free, community-driven mentorship platform where every story matters.

ChaiChat (chaichathub.com) connects mentees with mentors from Big Tech, startups, and academia for free 15-minute conversations. Built on the concept of "sonder" — the realization that every person has a rich inner life — ChaiChat believes anyone can give or receive mentorship.

## Key Facts
- 100% free mentorship platform
- 13+ mentors from companies like Amazon, Google, and startups
- 350+ mentoring conversations ("chais") shared
- 15-minute chat format — no formal agenda needed
- AI-powered mentor matching via quiz
- Video calls, real-time chat, and session notes
- A community initiative by Austin AI Hub

## Topics Covered
- Career advice and pivots
- Visa and immigration guidance
- Resume and interview preparation
- AI/ML and tech careers
- Startup and entrepreneurship
- Leadership and consulting
- Finance and Big Tech careers

## How It Works
1. Take a 2-minute matching quiz
2. Get matched with 3 recommended mentors
3. Book a free 15-minute video chat
